name: iqaudio
text: Enable IQaudIO sound card\n%1 Disable built-in audio card\nRequires restart to take effect
shortDescription: Enable support for a IQaudIO sound card.
longDescription: IQaudIO make and sell several high quality audio cards for Raspberry Pi - this block enables them and gives you the option of disabling the Raspberry Pi's built in audio card to prevent any confusion between the two.
